text:
#lockdown will be tough. We can only beat #COVID19 with #CovidVaccine and #HandsFaceSpace, so lockdown is necessary.
 #WashYourHands #WearAMask #keepyourdistance↔️ AND have your #vaccine.

Vaccine clinic @StGeorgesTrust now offering #covidvaccination to all patient-facing staff. https://t.co/nyfTo6Unp6
